Skills.title: JavaScript
Skills.description: I'm skilled in JavaScript, using it to make websites do cool things. I've worked on making websites interactive, quick, and user-friendly. JavaScript helps me add life to web pages.

Skills.title: React
Skills.description: I'm experienced in React, a tool that helps me build websites that look great and work smoothly. I create reusable parts for websites, making them easy to manage and quick to load. I enjoy making single-page applications that feel modern and snappy.

Skills.title: Node.js
Skills.description: With Node.js, I build the behind-the-scenes parts of websites. It allows me to create powerful servers and build things that update in real-time. Node.js helps me make websites that can handle a bunch of people using them at the same time.

Skills.title: C++
Skills.description: I know my way around C++, a language that's super powerful. I use it for tasks that need to be fast and efficient, like building computer programs and games. It lets me control how the computer uses its memory and resources, making things work really well.

Projects.title: Workout Tracker
Projects.description: React-based app for personalized exercise planning. Responsive interface ensures seamless tracking and analysis of workout data.

Projects.title: DuoMatch Card Game
Projects.description: Competitive two-player card game focusing on interactive card-matching. Players reveal and match cards, earning points for successful pairs.

Projects.title: Portfolio Website
Projects.description: Sleek, user-centric platform showcasing skills and achievements. Engaging design for easy navigation and a lasting brand impression.
